name: HyperTerminal Session File
summary: Learn about .HT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: HyperTerminal is developed by Hilgraeve and was included with Microsoft operating systems up to Windows XP. However, Windows Vista and Windows 7 do not include HyperTerminal. The software is still available as the HyperTerminal Private Edition from the Hilgraeve website.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
